recipesJson.name: Peach Jam Monster
recipesJson.author: ZestyVapes
recipesJson.description:
This is my custom Jam Monster flavor. 
Peach + Jam + Toast
ENJOY

reviews.text: I'm not really getting the toast flavor like I normally get with Jam monster but this could also be because all I vape is blueberry jam monster and probably have some vapors tongue going on and I'm also vaping it right after I made it. But the peach flavor is very well done. Very tasty. Thanks for sharing this!
